Ketua DPRD DKI Ikut Desak Anies Baswedan Buka Data APBD DKI 2020
05 Nov 2019, 13:24 by Antara, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Ketua DPRD DKI Jakarta Prasetio Edi Marsudi memberikan dukungan kepada anggotanya, William Aditya Sarana, yang mendesak Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan untuk segera membuka dokumen rancangan APBD DKI 2020. Meskipun demikian, Prasetio mengaku belum mengetahui kabar soal diadukannya William ke Badan Kehormatan DPRD DKI karena mengunggah kejanggalan rancangan APBD DKI 2020 ke media sosial.
"Soal itu (William dilaporkan) saya belum mendapat tembusan dari Badan Kehormatan, tapi di sini saya akan menyampaikan bahwa saya juga mendesak agar Gubernur membuka draf Kebijakan Umum Anggaran dan Prioritas Plafon Anggaran (KUA-PPAS) tahun 2020 seluruhnya," kata Prasetio di Jakarta, Selasa 5 November 2019.
Permintaan pembukaan draf KUA-PPAS tahun 2020 yang sudah dianggap janggal, kata politisi PDI Perjuangan itu, karena hak penganggaran daerah juga ada di DPRD yang dipimpinnya.
"Ini kan jadi tanggung jawab saya sebagai ketua DPRD juga. Kalau ada anggaran yang dianggap janggal mari kita luruskan dengan pembahasan bersama agar anggaran tersebut matang dan bisa dipertanggungjawabkan," katanya.
Namun, kata Prasetio, pihaknya kesulitan melakukan pembahasan anggaran karena Pemprov DKI Jakarta hingga saat ini belum memberikan draft anggaran tersebut.
"Saya pun belum mendapat draf KUA-PPAS tahun 2020. Karenanya dalam waktu dekat saya akan kirimkan surat ke Gubernur agar dokumen tersebut dibuka agar kita bahas bersama dan sahkan sesuai dengan ketentuan," kata Prasetio.
Fraksi PSI DPRD DKI Jakarta sebelumnya telah meminta Pemprov DKI Jakarta untuk membuka dokumen tersebut ke publik melalui laman apbd.jakarta.go.id. Namun permintaan itu ditolak mentah-mentah dan dinyatakan baru akan dibuka setelah disahkan oleh DPRD DKI.
Meskipun demikian, William sempat mendapati dokumen tersebut diunggah di laman apbd.jakarta.go.id. Dalam penelusurannya, dia pun menemukan sejumlah anggaran janggal seperti pengadaan lem aibon sebesar Rp 82 miliar dan ballpoint sebesar Rp 123 miliar. William lantas mengunggahnya di media sosial twitter.
Unggahan William sempat membuat heboh hingga akhirnya anggaran lem aibon dihapus dan anggaran ballpoint direvisi menjadi anggaran alat tulis dan kantor sebesar Rp 18 miliar. Namun belakangan William diadukan oleh seseorang bernama Sugiyanto karena unggahannya itu dianggap melanggar kode etik.

Chairperson of DKI DPRD Participates in Urging Anies Baswedan to Open 2020 DKI APBD Data
05 Nov 2019, 13:24 by Antara, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Chairperson of DKI Jakarta DPRD Prasetio Edi Marsudi gave support to its member, William Aditya Sarana, who urged DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan to immediately open the DKI Jakarta APBD draft document. However, Prasetio claimed that he did not yet know the news of his complaint by William to The DKI Jakarta DPRD Honorary Agency for uploading irregularities in the DKI 2020 APBD draft to social media.
"The matter (William reported) I have not received a copy of the Honorary Agency, but here I will convey that I also urge that the Governor open the draft of the General Budget Policy and Priority Budget Ceiling (KUA-PPAS) in 2020," Prasetio said in Jakarta , Tuesday 5 November 2019.
The request to open the 2020 KUA-PPAS draft which was considered odd, said the PDI-P politician, was because the regional budgeting rights also existed in the DPRD that he led.
"This is my responsibility as the chair of the DPRD as well. If there is a budget that is considered odd, let us straighten out with a joint discussion so that the budget is mature and can be accounted for," he said.
However, Prasetio said, his party had difficulty in discussing the budget because the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government has not yet provided the draft budget.
"I have not yet received a KUA-PPAS draft in 2020. Therefore, in the near future I will send a letter to the Governor so that the document is opened so that we discuss it together and ratify it in accordance with the provisions," Prasetio said.
The DKI Jakarta DPRD PSI faction had previously asked the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government to open the document to the public through the apbd.jakarta.go.id page. However, the request was rejected outright and was declared to be opened only after being legalized by the DKI DPRD.
Nevertheless, William had found the document uploaded on the apbd.jakarta.go.id page. In his search, he also found a number of odd budgets such as the procurement of aibon glue amounting to Rp 82 billion and a ballpoint of Rp 123 billion. William then uploaded it on Twitter social media.
William's upload caused a stir until finally the Aibon glue budget was removed and the ballpoint budget was revised to a stationery and office budget of Rp 18 billion. However, later William was complained by someone named Sugiyanto because his upload was considered to violate the code of ethics.
